name: Slimes are the Strongest
description:
Slimes are the Strongest is a puzzle game. You are a single slime that wants to prove to everything that you are the strongest of them all, so you decide to divide and conquer. Multiply and increase numbers to become the greater threat and not only that, but seduce every woman in your path with your perfect body.
In this game, you'll have to choose the right path to increase your value and overcome your enemies.
This game aims to make you relax and enjoy life, with many hentai animations and casual challenges.

  • -Nudity or sexual content
  • -All scenes within the game are consensual
  • -A bunch of unique H-animations
  • -Not suitable for watching at work
  • -Not suitable for all ages
  • -All characters in the game are over 18 years old
